1370: Sibrando moved to Paternoster straetje.A.3 after marriage.
Got married to Mabelie at age 30 in 1370.
1372: Had a son with Mabelie, Valken, at age 32.
1373: Had a daughter with Mabelie, Tetta, at age 33.
1379: Had a daughter with Mabelie, Geile, at age 39.
1380: Lost son Marcilius when Marcilius was 0 years old.
Mabelie gave birth to their stillborn son Marcilius in 1380.
1385: Had a daughter with Mabelie, Clara, at age 45.
1386: Had a son with Mabelie, Bertoldus, at age 46.
